There was a glance from WH=
EELIE, "I do not know this MAGMATRON, and I do not care if he is strong.  L=
et someone else deal with him as they may, I do not care this day.  He has =
not done anything against me, and my friends are beyond his grip I can see.=
  I do not care for this fight, for there will be another one in the coming=
 night."

WHEELIE glanced up and over at GRIMLOCk, "And really, TERRORCONS,=
 working for someone else seems so begones.  I really wonder why this day, =
you're just general thugs for someone else anyway.  Why not do your own thi=
ng as you may?"
